name: Success Rate

claims.object: Rate of positive outcomes following a procedure

surface_layer.definition: The proportion of successful outcomes in a set of trials or procedures.

deep_layer.mechanism: Quantifies the degree to which a desired result is achieved.

instance_layer: Success rate of a marketing campaign

epistemic_metadata.source: Nerve Grafting and Reconstruction: Selected Indications - http://www.aetna.com/cpb/medical/data/400_499/0416.html
